content: spot your dog at the park with the help of this colorful crochet sweater stitched in machine wash and dry red heart super saver stripes the yarn changes colors for you so you can focus on stitching techniques include single_crochet working in back loop single_crochet 2 together and more choose your dog s best colors for this comfy crochet sweater that is sure to become their favorite materials red heart® super saver® stripes™ 5 oz/141g 236 yds/215 m sizes s m l xl favourite stripe 4965 1 1 2 2 ball s sizes to fit chest measurement s 10 25 5 cm m 14 35 5 cm l 17 43 cm xl 20 51 cm finished chest s 12 30 5 cm m 16½ 42 cm l 19 48 cm xl 22 56 cm
